title: UDL-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Adults with Autism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and job-related computational experience
context.additional_context: Customized design for autistic adult learners addressing challenges in attention, communication, and time management. Implementation of mobile applications and UDL principles in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners apply strategies to solve complex mathematical problems step-by-step in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners independently establish time management and task execution plans using a UDL-based mobile app at least three times.
Learners accurately explain mathematical concepts using multiple representations (visual/auditory/text) in a simulated environment with over 70% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
